data: See Special Instructions, flush replogle tube with 2 mL Sodium Chloride 0.9% q3h to q4h to maintain tube patency
NICU Primary and Secondary Feeding Order
Feed Base: Expressed Breast Milk (EBM), 68kcal/100mL, Pasteurized Donor Milk (PDM) 68kcal/100mL

Route: NG Tube, Frequency: every 2 hours, Feed Bolus Infusion Time: 30 minutes
Route: NG Tube, Frequency: every 3 hours, Feed Bolus Infusion Time: 30 minutes
For birth weight less than 1 kg
For birth weight between 1 to 1.499 kg
For birth weight between 1.5 to 1.999 kg
For birth weight greater than or equal to 2 kg
May breastfeed with top-up as per NICU Primary and Secondary Feeding order
Refer to BCW Women's Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) Information on Pasteurized Donor Milk (PDM) for Early-Trophic Feeding
Nurse or provider to provide parent (s) or caregiver (s) with information about Pasteurized Donor Milk (PDM) and document the preference for supplementation when their milk is not available
Assess for oral cue based feeding
Refer to Enteral Feeding: Transition from Continuous to Two Hourly Feeding Schedule Policy
Refer to Enteral Feeding: Transitioning from Feeding Q2H to q3H and Q3H to Q4H Policy
Transition feeds from continuous to q2h
Transition feeds from continuous to q3h
Transition feeds from q2h to q3h
Transition feeds from q3h to q4h
